title: Best server in Saipan
body: I'm gonna migrate to Saipan and I'm wondering if it is still good to use my NA account or it is better to register to another server. Suggestion of computer gaming shops and the best internet service provider will also be helpful. Thank you for reading.

replies.body: haha yep I'm thinking that some people in Saipan might be using Oce server that's why haha
Why are you posting this in Oce

> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sANmtsB8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-24T04:58:40.826+0000)
>
> Why are you posting this in Oce

He's wondering if he'll get better ping with Oceania over North America or one of the other servers.

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sANmtsB8,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-24T05:23:43.065+0000)
